entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 08:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
